duck: Operation Tractable, a military operation in Normandy 1944
another involves the use of mathematical closed-form expressions
Tractable problem, in computational complexity theory, a problem that can be solved in polynomial time
tractable definition: capable of being easily led, taught, or controlled.

wiki.text:
'Tractable' (meaning "easily managed") may refer to: *Operation Tractable, a
military operation in Normandy 1944 *'Tractability' concerning how easily
something can be done ** Tractable problem, in computational complexity theory,
a problem that can be solved in polynomial time **another involves the use of
mathematical closed-form expressions
wiki.title: tractable
